In reality many boys probably felt much more close to their "dojo
families" than their real families.
Phil started this I just want to continue it ~ here goes...

weird situation (if all the mothers of the Shinsengumi had a get together)

RK Saitou's mom "he was such a picky eater, the only food he would eat
was soba"
(I also recall a humorous fanfic where baby RK Saitou bit people! LOL!)

Nagakura's mom "he started talking at 3 months! and never stopped"
(I've been wondering how old Nagakura was when he wrote his book and
if he dictated it to someone?  if he dictated some parts then he may
have been a chatterbox as we all assume him to have been :P)

NHK Harada's mom "I was frying some spring rolls, my hands were a bit
oily but I had to pick him up---and accidently dropped him"

NHK Hijikata's mom "the neighbors, for some odd reason brought him
home early from the play date and said to never let my son within 100
yards of their daughter"
